scripts.build-windows: cd app && npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && Xcopy /E /y  "build" "..\public"
scripts.build-dev-windows: cd app && npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && Xcopy /E /y  "build" "..\public"
scripts.dev: npm run build-dev-windows && npm run start-dev-windows
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run build-windows && npm start-windows
